price: 35. Mpo ete balia bambuma na yango, mpe na oyo maboko na bango masali. Boye bakozala na botondi te?
arabic: لِيَأۡكُلُواْ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتۡهُ أَيۡدِيهِمۡۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ
footnotes: 2 A’nab: Bótala yango na Al-Baqarah: 266. Na suratu Al-An’ám: 99.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: liyakulū min thamarihi wamā ʿamilathu aydīhim afalā yashkurūna
